Name: Neverliria
About the game: Neverliria is a survival sandbox game, where you play for the fire-headed girl, lost in a fantasy forest full of shadows and dangers. The most reliable way of protecting yourself from the darkness is light (of the campfire or your own hand-held phoenix) or ... a perfect arrow of the faithful servant-dwarf. In Neverliria you will have a unique survival game experience, where resources are more than typical wood or stone, but also fantastic creatures and magic items. * 20 types of buildings available for construction and improvement. * Lots of resources and unique items that give new opportunities for development. * Procedurally generated world filled with many fantastic places and creatures. * Create sources of light and get the support of the allies to protect yourself from the forces of darkness! * Beautiful pixel stylistics.
